author: lehmi
msg: PDFBOX-1491: avoid NPE if an image mask uses colour key masking

author: jleroux
msg: I discovered while using trunk demo that getServerTimestampAsLong is not enough. Because Javascript always creates the dates without taking into account the TimeZone. I mean there are OOTB no ways to do otherwise and date.format.js does not help. This makes sense from a HTTP client perspective, but nowadays it's really aging with Ajax, etc.

Fortunately there is a miraculous script which helps much: date.timezone.js. I have introduced it with a getServerTimeZone service. I tested locally by setting another timezone on another machine and it worked. I will now test it on trunk, I don't expect any issues
I also cleaned the NOTICE for famfamfam
